## IEngineConfig.flipX property

If true, mirrors the result coordinates ([IResultEvent.coordinates](./yoha.iresultevent.coordinates.md)<!-- -->) along the y axis. In other words, \[x, y\] becomes \[1 - x, y\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
flipX?: boolean;
```
